query:
-- https://github.com/launchbadge/sqlx/issues/1266
            SELECT
                id as "id!",
                title as "title!",
                owner_id as "owner_id!",
                current_version_id
            FROM shared_instances
            WHERE owner_id = $1
            UNION
            SELECT
                id as "id!",
                title as "title!",
                owner_id as "owner_id!",
                current_version_id
            FROM shared_instances
            JOIN shared_instance_users ON id = shared_instance_id
            WHERE user_id = $1
